from flask import Flask, render_template
import os
from src.qualia import get_latest_event

app = Flask(__name__)


@app.route("/")
def index():
    image_url, summary, qualia = get_latest_event()
    spotify_playlist_uri = os.environ.get(
        'SPOTIFY_PLAYLIST_ID', 'spotify:playlist:5SCYMGXrvwRtlCe9sTC7m7')

    return render_template("index.html",
                           image_url=image_url,
                           spotify_playlist_uri=spotify_playlist_uri,
                           image_description=summary)


if __name__ == "__main__":
    app.run(host="0.0.0.0", port=5000, debug=True)

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Flowing Psychedelic Background</title>
    <style>
        body, html {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            height: 100%;
            overflow: hidden;
        }
        #canvas {
            position: fixed;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            z-index: -1;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <canvas id="canvas"></canvas>
    <script>
        const canvas = document.getElementById('canvas');
        const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');

        let width, height;
        let time = 0;
        const particles = [];
        const numParticles = 5000;
        const noiseScale = 0.005;

        function resizeCanvas() {
            width = window.innerWidth;
            height = window.innerHeight;
            canvas.width = width;
            canvas.height = height;
        }

        class Particle {
            constructor() {
                this.x = Math.random() * width;
                this.y = Math.random() * height;
                this.prevX = this.x;
                this.prevY = this.y;
                this.hue = Math.random() * 360;
                this.size = Math.random() * 2 + 1;
            }

            update() {
                this.prevX = this.x;
                this.prevY = this.y;

                let angle = noise(this.x * noiseScale, this.y * noiseScale, time) * Math.PI * 2;
                this.x += Math.cos(angle) * 2;
                this.y += Math.sin(angle) * 2;

                if (this.x < 0) this.x = width;
                if (this.x > width) this.x = 0;
                if (this.y < 0) this.y = height;
                if (this.y > height) this.y = 0;

                this.hue = (this.hue + 0.5) % 360;
            }

            draw() {
                ctx.beginPath();
                ctx.moveTo(this.prevX, this.prevY);
                ctx.lineTo(this.x, this.y);
                ctx.strokeStyle = `hsla(${this.hue}, 100%, 50%, 0.1)`;
                ctx.lineWidth = this.size;
                ctx.stroke();
            }
        }

        function noise(x, y, z) {
            const X = Math.floor(x) & 255;
            const Y = Math.floor(y) & 255;
            const Z = Math.floor(z) & 255;

            x -= Math.floor(x);
            y -= Math.floor(y);
            z -= Math.floor(z);

            const u = fade(x);
            const v = fade(y);
            const w = fade(z);

            const A = p[X  ]+Y, AA = p[A]+Z, AB = p[A+1]+Z;
            const B = p[X+1]+Y, BA = p[B]+Z, BB = p[B+1]+Z;

            return lerp(w, lerp(v, lerp(u, grad(p[AA  ], x  , y  , z   ),
                                           grad(p[BA  ], x-1, y  , z   )),
                                   lerp(u, grad(p[AB  ], x  , y-1, z   ),
                                           grad(p[BB  ], x-1, y-1, z   ))),
                           lerp(v, lerp(u, grad(p[AA+1], x  , y  , z-1 ),
                                           grad(p[BA+1], x-1, y  , z-1 )),
                                   lerp(u, grad(p[AB+1], x  , y-1, z-1 ),
                                           grad(p[BB+1], x-1, y-1, z-1 ))));
        }

        function fade(t) { return t * t * t * (t * (t * 6 - 15) + 10); }
        function lerp(t, a, b) { return a + t * (b - a); }
        function grad(hash, x, y, z) {
            const h = hash & 15;
            const u = h<8 ? x : y;
            const v = h<4 ? y : h==12||h==14 ? x : z;
            return ((h&1) == 0 ? u : -u) + ((h&2) == 0 ? v : -v);
        }

        const p = new Array(512);
        for (let i=0; i<256; i++) p[i] = p[i+256] = Math.floor(Math.random() * 256);

        function animate() {
            ctx.fillStyle = 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)';
            ctx.fillRect(0, 0, width, height);

            particles.forEach(particle => {
                particle.update();
                particle.draw();
            });

            time += 0.002;
            requestAnimationFrame(animate);
        }

        function init() {
            for (let i = 0; i < numParticles; i++) {
                particles.push(new Particle());
            }
        }

        window.addEventListener('resize', resizeCanvas);
        resizeCanvas();
        init();
        animate();
    </script>
</body>
</html>

<code_agent_execute language="python">
pass_message_to_subagent(
  subagent_message="""Please make the following changes to fix the layout and functionality issues:

1. Update static/css/style.css:
   - Modify the desktop layout (min-width: 768px) to show the image on the left and the playlist on the right.
   - Ensure the text description appears below the image in desktop view.

2. Update static/js/script.js:
   - Fix the issue with the mobile description overlay not showing up when the info icon is clicked.

Here are the specific changes for each file:

static/css/style.css:
```css
@media screen and (min-width: 768px) {
    .container {
        flex-direction: row;
        flex-wrap: wrap;
        justify-content: space-between;
    }

    .image-container {
        flex: 0 0 60%;
    }

    .text-description {
        flex: 0 0 60%;
        order: 2;
    }

    .spotify-container {
        flex: 0 0 35%;
    }

    .info-icon {
        display: none;
    }
}
```

static/js/script.js:
```javascript
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    const infoIcon = document.querySelector('.info-icon');
    const mobileDescription = document.querySelector('.mobile-description');
    const imageContainer = document.querySelector('.image-container');

    infoIcon.addEventListener('click', function(event) {
        event.stopPropagation();
        mobileDescription.classList.toggle('show');
    });

    imageContainer.addEventListener('click', function() {
        if (window.innerWidth <= 767) {
            mobileDescription.classList.remove('show');
        }
    });

    let resizeTimer;
    window.addEventListener('resize', function() {
        clearTimeout(resizeTimer);
        resizeTimer = setTimeout(function() {
            if (window.innerWidth > 767) {
                mobileDescription.classList.remove('show');
            }
        }, 250);
    });
});
```

Please implement these changes and let me know when you're done.""",

Here are the specific changes for each file:

static/css/style.css:
```css
@media screen and (min-width: 768px) {
    .container {
        flex-direction: row;
        flex-wrap: wrap;
        justify-content: space-between;
    }

    .image-container {
        flex: 0 0 60%;
    }
```

static/js/script.js:
```javascript
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    const infoIcon = document.querySelector('.info-icon');
    const mobileDescription = document.querySelector('.mobile-description');
    const imageContainer = document.querySelector('.image-container');

    infoIcon.addEventListener('click', function(event) {
        event.stopPropagation();
        mobileDescription.classList.toggle('show');
    });

    imageContainer.addEventListener('click', function() {
        if (window.innerWidth <= 767) {
            mobileDescription.classList.remove('show');
        }
    });

    let resizeTimer;
    window.addEventListener('resize', function() {
        clearTimeout(resizeTimer);
        resizeTimer = setTimeout(function() {
            if (window.innerWidth > 767) {
                mobileDescription.classList.remove('show');
            }
        }, 250);
    });
});
```

Please implement these changes and let me know when you're done.""",

from flask import Flask, render_template
import os

app = Flask(__name__)

@app.route("/")
def index():
    image_url = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/luleoapp/luleo/main/daily_data/2024-09-10/outputs/image_1123.webp"
    spotify_playlist_uri = os.environ.get('SPOTIFY_PLAYLIST_ID', 'spotify:playlist:5SCYMGXrvwRtlCe9sTC7m7')
    image_description = "This is a beautiful landscape image. It showcases the serene beauty of nature."
    return render_template("index.html",
                           image_url=image_url,
                           spotify_playlist_uri=spotify_playlist_uri,
                           image_description=image_description)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    app.run(host="0.0.0.0", port=5000, debug=True)

document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    const infoIcon = document.querySelector('.info-icon');
    const mobileDescription = document.querySelector('.mobile-description');
    const imageContainer = document.querySelector('.image-container');

    infoIcon.addEventListener('click', function(event) {
        event.stopPropagation();
        mobileDescription.style.display = mobileDescription.style.display === 'block' ? 'none' : 'block';

        if (window.innerWidth <= 767) {
            mobileDescription.style.display = 'none';
        }
    });
});

</code_agent_thoughts>
<code_agent_write_file file_path="static/js/script.js">
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    const infoIcon = document.querySelector('.info-icon');
    const mobileDescription = document.querySelector('.mobile-description');
    const imageContainer = document.querySelector('.image-container');

    infoIcon.addEventListener('click', function(event) {
        event.stopPropagation();
        mobileDescription.classList.toggle('show');
    });

    imageContainer.addEventListener('click', function() {
        if (window.innerWidth <= 767) {
            mobileDescription.classList.remove('show');
        }
    });

    let resizeTimer;
    window.addEventListener('resize', function() {
        clearTimeout(resizeTimer);
        resizeTimer = setTimeout(function() {
            if (window.innerWidth > 767) {
                mobileDescription.classList.remove('show');
            }
        }, 250);
    });
});
</code_agent_write_file>

}

.container {
    max-width: 1200px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding: 20px;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: stretch;
    transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
}

.image-container {
    position: relative;
    width: 100%;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
}

.responsive-image {
    width: 100%;
    height: auto;
    max-height: 80vh;
    object-fit: cover;
    display: block;
    transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
}

.text-description {
    display: block;
    margin-top: 20px;
    padding: 10px;
    background-color: #f0f0f0;
    border-radius: 5px;
    transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
}

.spotify-container {
    width: 100%;
    padding: 20px;
    transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
}

.spotify-container iframe {
    border-radius: 12px;
    width: 100%;
    height: 380px;
    transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
}

.info-icon {
    display: none;
    position: absolute;
    bottom: 10px;
    left: 10px;
    color: white;
    font-size: 24px;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
}

.mobile-description {
    display: none;
    position: absolute;
    bottom: 0;

    color: white;
    padding: 10px;
    overflow-y: auto;
    transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
    transform: translateY(100%);
    opacity: 0;
}

.mobile-description.show {
    transform: translateY(0);
    opacity: 1;
}

@media screen and (min-width: 768px) {
    .container {
        flex-direction: row;
        flex-wrap: wrap;

agent_memory.message:
<code_agent_thoughts>
Now that we've updated the CSS file, let's update the JavaScript file to fix the issue with the mobile description overlay not showing up when the info icon is clicked.
</code_agent_thoughts>
<code_agent_write_file file_path="static/js/script.js">
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    const infoIcon = document.querySelector('.info-icon');
    const mobileDescription = document.querySelector('.mobile-description');
    const imageContainer = document.querySelector('.image-container');

    infoIcon.addEventListener('click', function(event) {
        event.stopPropagation();
        mobileDescription.classList.toggle('show');
    });

    imageContainer.addEventListener('click', function() {
        if (window.innerWidth <= 767) {
            mobileDescription.classList.remove('show');
        }
    });

    let resizeTimer;
    window.addEventListener('resize', function() {
        clearTimeout(resizeTimer);
        resizeTimer = setTimeout(function() {
            if (window.innerWidth > 767) {
                mobileDescription.classList.remove('show');
            }
        }, 250);
    });
});
</code_agent_write_file>

</code_agent_thoughts>
<code_agent_write_file file_path="static/js/background.js">
const canvas = document.getElementById('canvas');
const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');

let width, height;
let time = 0;
const particles = [];
const numParticles = 5000;
const noiseScale = 0.005;

function resizeCanvas() {
    width = window.innerWidth;
    height = window.innerHeight;
    canvas.width = width;
    canvas.height = height;
}

class Particle {
    constructor() {
        this.x = Math.random() * width;
        this.y = Math.random() * height;
        this.prevX = this.x;
        this.prevY = this.y;
        this.hue = Math.random() * 360;
        this.size = Math.random() * 2 + 1;
    }

    update() {
        this.prevX = this.x;
        this.prevY = this.y;

        let angle = noise(this.x * noiseScale, this.y * noiseScale, time) * Math.PI * 2;
        this.x += Math.cos(angle) * 2;
        this.y += Math.sin(angle) * 2;

        if (this.x < 0) this.x = width;
        if (this.x > width) this.x = 0;
        if (this.y < 0) this.y = height;
        if (this.y > height) this.y = 0;

        this.hue = (this.hue + 0.5) % 360;
    }

    draw() {
        ctx.beginPath();
        ctx.moveTo(this.prevX, this.prevY);
        ctx.lineTo(this.x, this.y);
        ctx.strokeStyle = `hsla(${this.hue}, 100%, 50%, 0.1)`;
        ctx.lineWidth = this.size;
        ctx.stroke();
    }
}

function noise(x, y, z) {
    const X = Math.floor(x) & 255;
    const Y = Math.floor(y) & 255;
    const Z = Math.floor(z) & 255;

    x -= Math.floor(x);
    y -= Math.floor(y);
    z -= Math.floor(z);

    const u = fade(x);
    const v = fade(y);
    const w = fade(z);

    const A = p[X  ]+Y, AA = p[A]+Z, AB = p[A+1]+Z;
    const B = p[X+1]+Y, BA = p[B]+Z, BB = p[B+1]+Z;

    return lerp(w, lerp(v, lerp(u, grad(p[AA  ], x  , y  , z   ),
                                   grad(p[BA  ], x-1, y  , z   )),
                           lerp(u, grad(p[AB  ], x  , y-1, z   ),
                                   grad(p[BB  ], x-1, y-1, z   ))),
                   lerp(v, lerp(u, grad(p[AA+1], x  , y  , z-1 ),
                                   grad(p[BA+1], x-1, y  , z-1 )),
                           lerp(u, grad(p[AB+1], x  , y-1, z-1 ),
                                   grad(p[BB+1], x-1, y-1, z-1 ))));
}

function fade(t) { return t * t * t * (t * (t * 6 - 15) + 10); }
function lerp(t, a, b) { return a + t * (b - a); }
function grad(hash, x, y, z) {
    const h = hash & 15;
    const u = h<8 ? x : y;
    const v = h<4 ? y : h==12||h==14 ? x : z;
    return ((h&1) == 0 ? u : -u) + ((h&2) == 0 ? v : -v);
}

const p = new Array(512);
for (let i=0; i<256; i++) p[i] = p[i+256] = Math.floor(Math.random() * 256);

function animate() {
    ctx.fillStyle = 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)';
    ctx.fillRect(0, 0, width, height);

    particles.forEach(particle => {
        particle.update();
        particle.draw();
    });

    time += 0.002;
    requestAnimationFrame(animate);
}

function init() {
    for (let i = 0; i < numParticles; i++) {
        particles.push(new Particle());
    }
}

window.addEventListener('resize', resizeCanvas);
resizeCanvas();
init();
animate();
</code_agent_write_file>

* {
    box-sizing: border-box;
    margin: 0;

    font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
    line-height: 1.6;
    background-color: #f4f4f4;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    position: relative;
    z-index: 1;
}

.container {
    max-width: 1200px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding: 20px;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: stretch;
    transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
    position: relative;
    z-index: 2;
    background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
}

.image-container {
    position: relative;
    width: 100%;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
}

.responsive-image {
    width: 100%;
    height: auto;
    max-height: 80vh;
    object-fit: cover;
    display: block;
    transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
}

.text-description {
    display: block;
    margin-top: 20px;
    padding: 10px;
    background-color: #f0f0f0;
    border-radius: 5px;
    transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
}

.spotify-container {
    width: 100%;
    padding: 20px;
    transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
}

.spotify-container iframe {
    border-radius: 12px;
    width: 100%;
    height: 380px;
    transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
}

.info-icon {
    display: none;
    position: absolute;
    bottom: 10px;
    left: 10px;
    color: white;
    font-size: 24px;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
}

.mobile-description {
    display: none;
    position: absolute;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    min-height: 25%;
    max-height: 75%;
    background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);
    color: white;
    padding: 15px;
    overflow-y: auto;
    transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
    transform: translateY(100%);
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: 1.4;
}

.mobile-description.show {
    display: block;
    transform: translateY(0);
}

iframe {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    display: block;
}

.image-container, .spotify-container {
    font-size: 0;
    line-height: 0;
}

#canvas {
    position: fixed;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    z-index: -1;
}

@media screen and (min-width: 768px) {
    .container {
        flex-direction: row;
        flex-wrap: wrap;
        justify-content: space-between;
    }

    .image-container {
        flex: 0 0 60%;
    }

    .text-description {
        flex: 0 0 60%;
        order: 2;
    }

        flex: 0 0 35%;
    }

    .info-icon {
        display: none;
    }
}

@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {

        padding: 0;

        margin: 0;

        display: block;

    }

        display: none;
    }

    .info-icon {
        display: block;

        margin: 0;

    }

}

    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: stretch;
    transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
}

.image-container {
    position: relative;
    width: 100%;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
    overflow: hidden; /* Add this to contain the blur effect */
}

.responsive-image {
    width: 100%;
    height: auto;
    max-height: 80vh;
    object-fit: cover;
    display: block;
    transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
    filter: blur(5px); /* Add blur effect to the image */
}

.text-description {
    display: block;
    margin-top: 20px;
    padding: 10px;
    background-color: rgba(240, 240, 240, 0.1); /* Make background slightly transparent */
    border-radius: 5px;
    transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
}

.spotify-container {
    width: 100%;
    padding: 20px;
    transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
}

.spotify-container iframe {
    border-radius: 12px;
    width: 100%;
    height: 380px;
    transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
}

.info-icon {
    display: none;
    position: absolute;
    bottom: 10px;
    left: 10px;
    color: white;
    font-size: 24px;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
    z-index: 1; /* Ensure the icon is above the blurred image */
}

.mobile-description {
    display: none;
    position: absolute;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    min-height: 25%;
    max-height: 75%;
    background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);
    color: white;
    padding: 15px;
    overflow-y: auto;
    transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
    transform: translateY(100%);
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: 1.4;
    z-index: 1; /* Ensure the description is above the blurred image */
}

.mobile-description.show {
    display: block;
    transform: translateY(0);
}

iframe {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    display: block;
}

.image-container, .spotify-container {
    font-size: 0;
    line-height: 0;
}

@media screen and (min-width: 768px) {
    .container {
        flex-direction: row;
        flex-wrap: wrap;
        justify-content: space-between;
    }

    .image-container {
        flex: 0 0 60%;
        transition: flex 0.5s ease-in-out;
    }

    .text-description {
        flex: 0 0 60%;
        order: 2;
        transition: flex 0.5s ease-in-out, order 0.5s ease-in-out;
    }

    .spotify-container {
        flex: 0 0 35%;
        transition: flex 0.5s ease-in-out;
    }

    .info-icon {
        display: none;
    }
}

@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {
    .container {
        padding: 0;

        flex-direction: column;

    .image-container {
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;

    }

        display: block;
        width: 100%;
        height: auto;
        transition: height 0.5s ease-in-out;
    }

        display: none;

<code_agent_thoughts>
Finally, let's update the JavaScript to handle the hamburger menu functionality.
</code_agent_thoughts>
<code_agent_write_file file_path="static/js/script.js">
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    const infoIcon = document.querySelector('.info-icon');
    const mobileDescription = document.querySelector('.mobile-description');
    const imageContainer = document.querySelector('.image-container');
    const hamburgerMenu = document.querySelector('.hamburger-menu');
    const mobileNav = document.querySelector('.mobile-nav');

    infoIcon.addEventListener('click', function(event) {
        event.stopPropagation();
        mobileDescription.classList.toggle('show');
    });

    imageContainer.addEventListener('click', function() {
        if (window.innerWidth <= 767) {
            mobileDescription.classList.remove('show');
        }
    });

    hamburgerMenu.addEventListener('click', function() {
        this.classList.toggle('active');
        mobileNav.style.display = mobileNav.style.display === 'block' ? 'none' : 'block';
    });

    let resizeTimer;
    window.addEventListener('resize', function() {
        clearTimeout(resizeTimer);
        resizeTimer = setTimeout(function() {
            if (window.innerWidth > 767) {
                mobileDescription.classList.remove('show');
                mobileNav.style.display = 'none';
                hamburgerMenu.classList.remove('active');
            }
        }, 250);
    });
});
</code_agent_write_file>

3. The layout appears to be the desktop version, with the image and Spotify playlist side by side, which is not typical for a mobile layout.

It seems that the changes we made to the HTML and CSS files are not being reflected in the current view. This could be due to a few reasons:

1. The screenshot might be showing the desktop view instead of the mobile view.
2. The CSS media queries might not be working correctly.
3. The changes might not have been properly saved or deployed to the server.

To properly answer the question, we would need to see the mobile view of the website. I recommend testing the website on a mobile device or using the browser's developer tools to simulate a mobile screen size. This will allow us to verify if the hamburger menu appears and if only "Luleo" is visible in the header for mobile view.

Regarding the browser console log, the warning about specifying a robustness level is not directly related to our layout changes. It's likely a message from one of the libraries or frameworks being used in the project.

<code_agent_write_file file_path="static/js/script.js">
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    const infoIcon = document.querySelector('.info-icon');
    const mobileDescription = document.querySelector('.mobile-description');
    const imageContainer = document.querySelector('.image-container');
    const hamburgerMenu = document.querySelector('.hamburger-menu');
    const mobileNav = document.querySelector('.mobile-nav');

    infoIcon.addEventListener('click', function(event) {
        event.stopPropagation();
        mobileDescription.classList.toggle('show');
    });

    imageContainer.addEventListener('click', function() {
        if (window.innerWidth <= 767) {
            mobileDescription.classList.remove('show');
        }
    });

    hamburgerMenu.addEventListener('click', function() {
        this.classList.toggle('active');
        mobileNav.classList.toggle('active');
    });

    let resizeTimer;
    window.addEventListener('resize', function() {
        clearTimeout(resizeTimer);
        resizeTimer = setTimeout(function() {
            if (window.innerWidth > 767) {
                mobileDescription.classList.remove('show');

agent_memory.message:
<code_agent_thoughts>
Now, let's update the JavaScript file to handle smooth scrolling to the 'About' section when clicking the navigation link.
</code_agent_thoughts>
<code_agent_write_file file_path="static/js/script.js">
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    const infoIcon = document.querySelector('.info-icon');
    const mobileDescription = document.querySelector('.mobile-description');
    const imageContainer = document.querySelector('.image-container');
    const hamburgerMenu = document.querySelector('.hamburger-menu');
    const mobileNav = document.querySelector('.mobile-nav');
    const navLinks = document.querySelectorAll('nav a');

    infoIcon.addEventListener('click', function(event) {
        event.stopPropagation();
        mobileDescription.classList.toggle('show');
    });

    imageContainer.addEventListener('click', function() {
        if (window.innerWidth <= 767) {
            mobileDescription.classList.remove('show');
        }
    });

    hamburgerMenu.addEventListener('click', function() {
        this.classList.toggle('active');
        mobileNav.classList.toggle('active');
    });

    navLinks.forEach(link => {
        link.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
            e.preventDefault();
            const targetId = this.getAttribute('href').substring(1);
            const targetElement = document.getElementById(targetId);
            
            if (targetElement) {
                targetElement.scrollIntoView({
                    behavior: 'smooth'
                });
            }

            if (window.innerWidth <= 767) {
                mobileNav.classList.remove('active');
                hamburgerMenu.classList.remove('active');
            }
        });
    });

    let resizeTimer;
    window.addEventListener('resize', function() {
        clearTimeout(resizeTimer);
        resizeTimer = setTimeout(function() {
            if (window.innerWidth > 767) {
                mobileDescription.classList.remove('show');
                mobileNav.classList.remove('active');
                hamburgerMenu.classList.remove('active');
            }
        }, 250);
    });
});
</code_agent_write_file>

    const infoIcon = document.querySelector('.info-icon');
    const mobileDescription = document.querySelector('.mobile-description');
    const imageContainer = document.querySelector('.image-container');
    const hamburgerMenu = document.querySelector('.hamburger-menu');
    const mobileNav = document.querySelector('.mobile-nav');
    const navLinks = document.querySelectorAll('nav a');

    infoIcon.addEventListener('click', function(event) {
        event.stopPropagation();
        mobileDescription.classList.toggle('show');
    });

    imageContainer.addEventListener('click', function() {
        if (window.innerWidth <= 767) {
            mobileDescription.classList.remove('show');
        }
    });

    hamburgerMenu.addEventListener('click', function() {
        this.classList.toggle('active');
        mobileNav.classList.toggle('active');
    });

    navLinks.forEach(link => {
        link.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
            e.preventDefault();
            const targetId = this.getAttribute('href').substring(1);
            const targetElement = document.getElementById(targetId);
            
            if (targetElement) {
                targetElement.scrollIntoView({
                    behavior: 'smooth'
                });
            }

            if (window.innerWidth <= 767) {
                mobileNav.classList.remove('active');
                hamburgerMenu.classList.remove('active');
            }
        });
    });

    let resizeTimer;
    window.addEventListener('resize', function() {
        clearTimeout(resizeTimer);
        resizeTimer = setTimeout(function() {
            if (window.innerWidth > 767) {
                mobileDescription.classList.remove('show');
                mobileNav.classList.remove('active');
                hamburgerMenu.classList.remove('active');
            }
        }, 250);
    });
});
</code_agent_write_file>

<code_agent_thoughts>
Now that we've updated the HTML and CSS, let's modify the JavaScript to handle the hamburger menu toggle functionality.
</code_agent_thoughts>
<code_agent_write_file file_path="static/js/script.js">
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    const infoIcon = document.querySelector('.info-icon');
    const mobileDescription = document.querySelector('.mobile-description');
    const imageContainer = document.querySelector('.image-container');
    const hamburgerMenu = document.querySelector('.hamburger-menu');
    const mobileNav = document.querySelector('.mobile-nav');
    const navLinks = document.querySelectorAll('nav a');

    infoIcon.addEventListener('click', function(event) {
        event.stopPropagation();
        mobileDescription.classList.toggle('show');
    });

    imageContainer.addEventListener('click', function() {
        if (window.innerWidth <= 767) {
            mobileDescription.classList.remove('show');
        }
    });

    hamburgerMenu.addEventListener('click', function() {
        this.classList.toggle('active');
        mobileNav.classList.toggle('active');
    });

    navLinks.forEach(link => {
        link.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
            e.preventDefault();
            const targetId = this.getAttribute('href').substring(1);
            const targetElement = document.getElementById(targetId);
            
            if (targetElement) {
                targetElement.scrollIntoView({
                    behavior: 'smooth'
                });
            }

            if (window.innerWidth <= 767) {
                mobileNav.classList.remove('active');
                hamburgerMenu.classList.remove('active');
            }
        });
    });

    let resizeTimer;
    window.addEventListener('resize', function() {
        clearTimeout(resizeTimer);
        resizeTimer = setTimeout(function() {
            if (window.innerWidth > 767) {
                mobileDescription.classList.remove('show');
                mobileNav.classList.remove('active');
                hamburgerMenu.classList.remove('active');
            }
        }, 250);
    });
});
</code_agent_write_file>

    background-color: #1a252f;
    padding: 1rem 0;
    position: sticky;
    top: 0;
    z-index: 1000;
}

.header-content {
    max-width: 1200px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding: 0 20px;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    align-items: center;
}

header h1 {
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    color: #ecf0f1;
}

.desktop-nav ul {
    list-style-type: none;
    display: flex;
}

.desktop-nav ul li {
    margin-left: 1rem;
}

.desktop-nav ul li a {
    color: #ecf0f1;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-size: 1rem;
    transition: color 0.3s ease;
}

.desktop-nav ul li a:hover {
    color: #3498db;
}

.container {
    max-width: 1200px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding: 20px;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: stretch;
    transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
}

.image-container {
    position: relative;
    width: 100%;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
    overflow: hidden;
}

.responsive-image {
    width: 100%;
    height: auto;
    max-height: 80vh;
    object-fit: cover;
    display: block;
    transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
}

.text-description {
    display: block;
    margin-top: 20px;
    padding: 10px;
    background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
    border-radius: 5px;
    transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
}

.spotify-container {
    width: 100%;
    padding: 20px;
    transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
}

.spotify-container iframe {
    border-radius: 12px;
    width: 100%;
    height: 380px;
    transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
}

.info-icon {
    display: none;
    position: absolute;
    bottom: 10px;
    left: 10px;
    color: white;
    font-size: 24px;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
    z-index: 1;
}

.mobile-description {
    display: none;
    position: absolute;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    min-height: 25%;
    max-height: 75%;
    background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);
    color: white;
    padding: 15px;
    overflow-y: auto;
    transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
    transform: translateY(100%);
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: 1.4;
    z-index: 1;
}

.mobile-description.show {
    display: block;
    transform: translateY(0);
}

.hamburger-menu {
    display: none;
    cursor: pointer;
}

.hamburger-menu span {
    display: block;
    width: 25px;
    height: 3px;
    background-color: #ecf0f1;
    margin: 5px 0;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.mobile-nav {
    display: none;
    background-color: #1a252f;
    position: fixed;
    top: 60px;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    z-index: 999;
}

.mobile-nav ul {
    list-style-type: none;
}

.mobile-nav ul li {
    padding: 15px 20px;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #2c3e50;
}

.mobile-nav ul li a {
    color: #ecf0f1;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-size: 1rem;
}

@media screen and (min-width: 768px) {
    .container {
        flex-direction: row;
        flex-wrap: nowrap;
        justify-content: space-between;
    }

    .image-container {
        flex: 0 0 60%;
        margin-right: 5%;
    }

    .spotify-container {
        flex: 0 0 35%;
    }

    .info-icon {
        display: none;
    }

    .desktop-nav {
        display: block;
    }

    .hamburger-menu {
        display: none;
    }

    header h1 .mobile-title {
        display: none;
    }

    header h1 .desktop-title {
        display: inline;
    }
}

@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {
    .container {
        flex-direction: column;
        padding: 0;
    }

    .image-container, .spotify-container {
        width: 100%;
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
        line-height: 0;
    }

    .spotify-container iframe {
        height: 80px;
        display: block;
        border: none;
        margin-top: -1px;
    }

    .header-content {
        padding: 0 15px;
        height: 60px;
        justify-content: space-between;
        align-items: center;
    }

    header h1 {
        font-size: 1.2rem;
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
    }

    header h1 .mobile-title {
        display: inline;
    }

    header h1 .desktop-title {
        display: none;
    }

    .desktop-nav {
        display: none;
    }

    .hamburger-menu {
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        justify-content: center;
        align-items: flex-end;
        height: 100%;
        width: 30px;
    }

    .hamburger-menu span {
        margin: 2px 0;
    }

    .info-icon {
        display: block;
    }

    .text-description {
        display: none;
    }

    .mobile-nav {
        display: none;
    }

    .mobile-nav.active {
        display: block;
    }
}
</code_agent_write_file>

        border: none;

    }

        padding: 0 15px;
        height: 60px;
        justify-content: space-between;
        align-items: center;
    }

    header h1 {
        font-size: 1.2rem;
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
    }

    header h1 .mobile-title {
        display: inline;
    }

    header h1 .desktop-title {
        display: none;

    .desktop-nav {
        display: none;

    .hamburger-menu {
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        justify-content: center;
        align-items: flex-end;
        height: 100%;
        width: 30px;
    }

    .hamburger-menu span {
        margin: 2px 0;
    }

    .info-icon {
        display: block;
    }

    .text-description {
        display: none;
    }

    .mobile-nav {
        display: none;
    }

    .mobile-nav.active {
        display: block;
    }

    /* Stack image and Spotify player vertically */
    .image-container, .spotify-container {
        width: 100%;
        flex: none;
    }

    .spotify-container iframe {
        height: 80px;
    }
}

<code_agent_thoughts>
Based on the feedback, it seems that our mobile styles are not being applied correctly. Let's start by ensuring that the CSS file is being loaded correctly and that the media queries are working as intended. We'll modify the CSS file to make the mobile styles more specific and forceful.

<code_agent_write_file file_path="static/css/style.css">
* {
    box-sizing: border-box;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
}

body {
    font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
    line-height: 1.6;
    background-color: #FFD580; /* Light orange background */
    color: #333;
}

header {
    background-color: #1a252f;
    padding: 1rem 0;
    position: sticky;
    top: 0;
    z-index: 1000;
}

.header-content {
    max-width: 1200px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding: 0 20px;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    align-items: center;
}

header h1 {
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    color: #ecf0f1;
}

.desktop-nav ul {
    list-style-type: none;
    display: flex;
}

.desktop-nav ul li {
    margin-left: 1rem;
}

.desktop-nav ul li a {
    color: #ecf0f1;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-size: 1rem;
    transition: color 0.3s ease;
}

.desktop-nav ul li a:hover {
    color: #3498db;
}

.container {
    max-width: 1200px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding: 20px;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: stretch;
    transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
}

.image-container {
    position: relative;
    width: 100%;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
    overflow: hidden;
}

.responsive-image {
    width: 100%;
    height: auto;
    max-height: 80vh;
    object-fit: cover;
    display: block;
    transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
}

.text-description {
    display: block;
    margin-top: 20px;
    padding: 10px;
    background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
    border-radius: 5px;
    transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
}

.spotify-container {
    width: 100%;
    padding: 20px;
    transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
}

.spotify-container iframe {
    border-radius: 12px;
    width: 100%;
    height: 380px;
    transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
}

.info-icon {
    display: none;
    position: absolute;
    bottom: 10px;
    left: 10px;
    color: white;
    font-size: 24px;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
    z-index: 1;
}

.mobile-description {
    display: none;
    position: absolute;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    min-height: 25%;
    max-height: 75%;
    background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);
    color: white;
    padding: 15px;
    overflow-y: auto;
    transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
    transform: translateY(100%);
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: 1.4;
    z-index: 1;
}

.mobile-description.show {
    display: block;
    transform: translateY(0);
}

.hamburger-menu {
    display: none;
    cursor: pointer;
}

.hamburger-menu span {
    display: block;
    width: 25px;
    height: 3px;
    background-color: #ecf0f1;
    margin: 5px 0;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.mobile-nav {
    display: none;
    background-color: #1a252f;
    position: fixed;
    top: 60px;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    z-index: 999;
}

.mobile-nav ul {
    list-style-type: none;
}

.mobile-nav ul li {
    padding: 15px 20px;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #2c3e50;
}

.mobile-nav ul li a {
    color: #ecf0f1;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-size: 1rem;
}

@media screen and (min-width: 768px) {
    .container {
        flex-direction: row;
        flex-wrap: nowrap;
        justify-content: space-between;
    }

    .image-container {
        flex: 0 0 60%;
        margin-right: 5%;
    }

    .spotify-container {
        flex: 0 0 35%;
    }

    .info-icon {
        display: none;
    }

    .desktop-nav {
        display: block;
    }

    .hamburger-menu {
        display: none;
    }

    header h1 .mobile-title {
        display: inline;
    }

    header h1 .desktop-title {
        display: inline;
    }
}

@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {
    body {
        background-color: #FFD580 !important; /* Ensure light orange background on mobile */
    }

    .container {
        flex-direction: column !important;
        padding: 0 !important;
    }

    .image-container, .spotify-container {
        width: 100% !important;
        margin: 0 !important;
        padding: 0 !important;
        line-height: 0 !important;
    }

    .spotify-container iframe {
        height: 80px !important;
        display: block !important;
        border: none !important;
        margin-top: -1px !important;
    }

    .header-content {
        padding: 0 15px !important;
        height: 60px !important;
        justify-content: space-between !important;
        align-items: center !important;
    }

    header h1 {
        font-size: 1.2rem !important;
        margin: 0 !important;
        padding: 0 !important;
        display: flex !important;
        align-items: center !important;
    }

    header h1 .mobile-title {
        display: inline !important;
    }

    header h1 .desktop-title {
        display: none !important;
    }

    .desktop-nav {
        display: none !important;
    }

    .hamburger-menu {
        display: flex !important;
        flex-direction: column !important;
        justify-content: center !important;
        align-items: flex-end !important;
        height: 100% !important;
        width: 30px !important;
    }

    .hamburger-menu span {
        margin: 2px 0 !important;
    }

    .info-icon {
        display: block !important;
    }

    .text-description {
        display: none !important;
    }

    .mobile-nav {
        display: none;
    }

    .mobile-nav.active {
        display: block !important;
    }

    /* Stack image and Spotify player vertically */
    .image-container, .spotify-container {
        width: 100% !important;
        flex: none !important;
    }

    /* Adjust Spotify player height for mobile */
    .spotify-container iframe {
        height: 80px !important;
    }
}
</code_agent_write_file>

<code_agent_thoughts>

We'll start by modifying the CSS file to correctly apply the mobile styles and adjust the header layout for mobile devices.

<code_agent_write_file file_path="static/css/style.css">
* {
    box-sizing: border-box;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
}

body {
    font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
    line-height: 1.6;
    background-color: #FFD580; /* Light orange background */
    color: #333;
}

header {
    background-color: #1a252f;
    padding: 1rem 0;
    position: sticky;
    top: 0;
    z-index: 1000;
}

.header-content {
    max-width: 1200px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding: 0 20px;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    align-items: center;
}

header h1 {
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    color: #ecf0f1;
}

.desktop-nav ul {
    list-style-type: none;
    display: flex;
}

.desktop-nav ul li {
    margin-left: 1rem;
}

.desktop-nav ul li a {
    color: #ecf0f1;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-size: 1rem;
    transition: color 0.3s ease;
}

.desktop-nav ul li a:hover {
    color: #3498db;
}

.container {
    max-width: 1200px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding: 20px;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: stretch;
    transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
}

.image-container {
    position: relative;
    width: 100%;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
    overflow: hidden;
}

.responsive-image {
    width: 100%;
    height: auto;
    max-height: 80vh;
    object-fit: cover;
    display: block;
    transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
}

.text-description {
    display: block;
    margin-top: 20px;
    padding: 10px;
    background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
    border-radius: 5px;
    transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
}

.spotify-container {
    width: 100%;
    padding: 20px;
    transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
}

.spotify-container iframe {
    border-radius: 12px;
    width: 100%;
    height: 380px;
    transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
}

.info-icon {
    display: none;
    position: absolute;
    bottom: 10px;
    left: 10px;
    color: white;
    font-size: 24px;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
    z-index: 1;
}

.mobile-description {
    display: none;
    position: absolute;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    min-height: 25%;
    max-height: 75%;
    background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);
    color: white;
    padding: 15px;
    overflow-y: auto;
    transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
    transform: translateY(100%);
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: 1.4;
    z-index: 1;
}

.mobile-description.show {
    display: block;
    transform: translateY(0);
}

.hamburger-menu {
    display: none;
    cursor: pointer;
}

.hamburger-menu span {
    display: block;
    width: 25px;
    height: 3px;
    background-color: #ecf0f1;
    margin: 5px 0;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.mobile-nav {
    display: none;
    background-color: #1a252f;
    position: fixed;
    top: 60px;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    z-index: 999;
}

.mobile-nav ul {
    list-style-type: none;
}

.mobile-nav ul li {
    padding: 15px 20px;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #2c3e50;
}

.mobile-nav ul li a {
    color: #ecf0f1;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-size: 1rem;
}

@media screen and (min-width: 768px) {
    .container {
        flex-direction: row;
        flex-wrap: nowrap;
        justify-content: space-between;
    }

    .image-container {
        flex: 0 0 60%;
        margin-right: 5%;
    }

    .spotify-container {
        flex: 0 0 35%;
    }

    .info-icon {
        display: none;
    }

    .desktop-nav {
        display: block;
    }

    .hamburger-menu {
        display: none;
    }

    header h1 .mobile-title {
        display: inline;
    }

    header h1 .desktop-title {
        display: inline;
    }
}

@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {
    body {
        background-color: #FFD580;
    }

    header {
        height: 50px;
    }

    .container {
        flex-direction: column;
        padding: 0;
    }

    .image-container, .spotify-container {
        width: 100%;
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
        line-height: 0;
    }

    .spotify-container iframe {
        height: 80px;
        display: block;
        border: none;
        margin-top: -1px;
    }

    .header-content {
        padding: 0 15px;
        height: 50px;
        justify-content: space-between;
        align-items: center;
    }

    header h1 {
        font-size: 1.2rem;
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
    }

    header h1 .mobile-title {
        display: inline;
    }

    header h1 .desktop-title {
        display: none;
    }

    .desktop-nav {
        display: none;
    }

    .hamburger-menu {
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        justify-content: center;
        align-items: flex-end;
        height: 50px;
        width: 30px;
    }

    .hamburger-menu span {
        margin: 2px 0;
    }

    .info-icon {
        display: block;
    }

    .text-description {
        display: none;
    }

    .mobile-nav {
        display: none;
        top: 50px;
    }

    .mobile-nav.active {
        display: block;
    }

    .image-container, .spotify-container {
        width: 100%;
        flex: none;
    }

    .spotify-container iframe {
        height: 80px;
    }
}
</code_agent_write_file>

.container {
    max-width: 1200px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding: 20px;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: stretch;
    transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
}

.image-container {
    position: relative;
    width: 100%;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
    overflow: hidden;
}

.responsive-image {
    width: 100%;
    height: auto;
    max-height: 80vh;
    object-fit: cover;
    display: block;
    transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
}

.text-description {
    display: block;
    margin-top: 20px;
    padding: 10px;
    background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
    border-radius: 5px;
    transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
}

.spotify-container {
    width: 100%;
    padding: 20px;
    transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
}

.spotify-container iframe {
    border-radius: 12px;
    width: 100%;
    height: 380px;
    transition: all 0.5s ease-in-out;
}

.info-icon {
    display: none;
    position: absolute;
    bottom: 10px;
    left: 10px;
    color: white;
    font-size: 24px;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
    z-index: 1;
}

.mobile-description {
    display: none;
    position: absolute;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    min-height: 25%;
    max-height: 75%;
    background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);
    color: white;
    padding: 15px;
    overflow-y: auto;
    transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out;
    transform: translateY(100%);
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: 1.4;
    z-index: 1;
}

.mobile-description.show {
    display: block;
    transform: translateY(0);
}

.hamburger-menu {
    display: none;
    cursor: pointer;
}

.hamburger-menu span {
    display: block;
    width: 25px;
    height: 3px;
    background-color: #ecf0f1;
    margin: 5px 0;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

.mobile-nav {
    display: none;
    background-color: #1a252f;
    position: fixed;
    top: 60px;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    z-index: 999;
}

.mobile-nav ul {
    list-style-type: none;
}

.mobile-nav ul li {
    padding: 15px 20px;
    border-bottom: 1px solid #2c3e50;
}

.mobile-nav ul li a {
    color: #ecf0f1;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-size: 1rem;
}

@media screen and (min-width: 768px) {
    .container {
        flex-direction: row;
        flex-wrap: nowrap;
        justify-content: space-between;
    }

    .image-container {
        flex: 0 0 60%;
        margin-right: 5%;
    }

    .spotify-container {
        flex: 0 0 35%;
    }

    .info-icon {
        display: none;
    }

    .desktop-nav {
        display: block;
    }

    .hamburger-menu {
        display: none;
    }

    header h1 .mobile-title {
        display: inline;
    }

    header h1 .desktop-title {
        display: inline;
    }
}

@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {
    .header-content {
        height: 50px;
        justify-content: space-between;
        padding: 0 15px;
    }

    header h1 {
        font-size: 1.2rem;
    }

    header h1 .mobile-title {
        display: inline;
    }

    header h1 .desktop-title {
        display: none;
    }

    .desktop-nav {
        display: none;
    }

    .hamburger-menu {
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        justify-content: center;
        align-items: flex-end;
        height: 50px;
        width: 30px;
    }

    .hamburger-menu span {
        margin: 2px 0;
    }

    .container {
        flex-direction: column;
        padding: 0;
    }

    .image-container, .spotify-container {
        width: 100%;
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
    }

    .spotify-container iframe {
        height: 80px;
    }

    .info-icon {
        display: block;
    }

    .text-description {
        display: none;
    }

    .mobile-nav {
        top: 50px;
    }

    .mobile-nav.active {
        display: block;
    }
}
</code_agent_write_file>

* {

body {
    font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
    line-height: 1.6;
    background-color: #FFD580;
    color: #333;
}

header {
    background-color: #1a252f;
    position: sticky;
    top: 0;
    z-index: 1000;
}

.header-content {
    max-width: 1200px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding: 0 20px;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    align-items: center;
    height: 60px;
}

header h1 {
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    color: #ecf0f1;
}

.desktop-nav ul {
    list-style-type: none;
    display: flex;
}

.desktop-nav ul li {
    margin-left: 1rem;
}

.desktop-nav ul li a {
    color: #ecf0f1;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-size: 1rem;
    transition: color 0.3s ease;
}

.desktop-nav ul li a:hover {
    color: #3498db;
}

/* Mobile styles */
@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {
    .header-content {
        height: 50px;
        justify-content: space-between;
        align-items: center;
        padding: 0 15px;
    }

    header h1 {
        font-size: 1.2rem;
        margin: 0;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        height: 100%;
    }

    header h1 .mobile-title {
        display: inline;
    }

    header h1 .desktop-title {
        display: none;
    }

    .desktop-nav {
        display: none;
    }

    .hamburger-menu {
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        justify-content: center;
        align-items: flex-end;
        height: 50px;
        width: 30px;
        cursor: pointer;
    }

    .hamburger-menu span {
        display: block;
        width: 25px;
        height: 3px;
        background-color: #ecf0f1;
        margin: 2px 0;
        transition: all 0.3s ease;
    }

    .mobile-nav {
        display: none;
        background-color: #1a252f;
        position: absolute;
        top: 50px;
        left: 0;
        right: 0;
        z-index: 999;
    }

    .mobile-nav.active {
        display: block;
    }

    .mobile-nav ul {
        list-style-type: none;
    }

    .mobile-nav ul li {
        padding: 15px 20px;
        border-bottom: 1px solid #2c3e50;
    }

    .mobile-nav ul li a {
        color: #ecf0f1;
        text-decoration: none;
        font-size: 1rem;
    }
}

/* Container styles */
.container {
    max-width: 1200px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding: 20px;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: stretch;
}

/* Image container styles */
.image-container {
    position: relative;
    width: 100%;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.responsive-image {
    width: 100%;
    height: auto;
    max-height: 80vh;
    object-fit: cover;
    display: block;
}

/* Text description styles */
.text-description {
    margin-top: 20px;
    padding: 10px;
    background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
    border-radius: 5px;
}

/* Spotify container styles */
.spotify-container {
    width: 100%;
    padding: 20px;
}

.spotify-container iframe {
    border-radius: 12px;
    width: 100%;
    height: 380px;
}

/* Mobile-specific styles */
@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {

        padding: 10px;

    .spotify-container iframe {
        height: 80px;
    }

    .text-description {
        display: none;

    .info-icon {
        display: block;

        color: white;
        font-size: 24px;
        cursor: pointer;

    .mobile-description {
        display: none;
        position: absolute;
        bottom: 0;
        left: 0;
        right: 0;
        background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);
        color: white;
        padding: 15px;
        max-height: 50%;
        overflow-y: auto;
    }

    .mobile-description.show {
        display: block;
    }
}
